title: Pacman
content:
Surely we all remember Pacman one of the most famous game characters, it was only a matter of time before a movie would be made and now it's finnaly coming.
According to [url=http://imdb.com/title/tt0473377/]IMDB[/url] this movie will be out in 2007.
Those who are as impatient as me can watch the trailer [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fWL6j0SvqV0&eurl=]here.[/url]
This movie really has everything:
- horrow with blood and guts[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-bloody.gif[/img]
- A super heroe
- awesome CGI
- scary monsters
- a chick[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-drool.gif[/img]
- a lot violent action
- and more and more

Enjoy.
[img]http://www.xensei.com/users/jeffm/www/pacman/rendered-pacman.gif[/img]-----------------
[img]http://www.jamster.co.uk/s/jcw/img/logo_jamster_navi.gif[/img][img]http://www.jamster.co.uk/storage/view/335/0/cr/CrazyFrog___Axel_F_Falling.gif[/img]

content:

title: Re: Pacman
content:
I don't know wether I should laugh...

Or cry.

title: hehe
content:
Interesting commentary on the lame-ness of current Video-game-inspired movies. Or something. Aside from the low production values, I found it odd that they'd use music from the beginning of Ms. Pac Man for a Pac Man movie. :-) At least they showed a brief shot of her as "back-up."

That was cute, Djaser... Nice find.

title: Re: hehe
content:
Ah hah hah, this is really ridiculous. /me loves. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img] ___________________
DaVince, Yet Another Amateur Game Creator! :P

title: Re: hehe
content:
I don't think it's a joke, take a look at the credits, it's an Uwe Boll movie. You all know this man I suppose, he's a legend.-----------------
[img]http://www.jamster.co.uk/s/jcw/img/logo_jamster_navi.gif[/img][img]http://www.jamster.co.uk/storage/view/335/0/cr/CrazyFrog___Axel_F_Falling.gif[/img]

title: Re: hehe
content:
At some points, it looks like a joke, but, if it was supposed to be a comedy, its possible that they did those things on purpose.-Genius314

title: re:
content: I saw this a few days ago, and yes, it's a joke :P. I thought that was kind of obvious myself, but whatever.

title: Re: re:
content:
So there will be or not be a Pacman movie? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img] I want to see one!

We need also Space Invaders - The Movie.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: re:
content:
There will be a pacman movie, I knew this long before the trailer was out.

If the trailer itself it a joke then we need better prove than 'it's obvious.' There are worse movies released than this one.-----------------

title: Re: re:
content:
I think it's way more than obvious that it's a fake.
Even compared to bad movies there is a difference.
Pay attention to the acting, the camera work, the locations, the special effects, the overall effect.
Actually considering your and my posts in the CK GBC thread this is probably another thing I can't convince you of, but that's OK, we're both entitled to our beliefs.
In general I'm a pretty sceptical person that requires proof as well, but in the end there is nothing in existance that can actually be really proven, which is scientific fact, so it still fits me. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Retodon8

Looking them up... House of the Dead, Alone in the Dark, BloodRayne.

That probably says something about the quality. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

Those movies mainly feature bad writing, bad dialogue... and camera work that's sub-par, but they're still recognisable as something that's quite a bit of money has been put it into.Retodon8
